alert.note: Alert for East Platte County; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued March 14 at 2:34PM MDT until March 15 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Platte County including Interstate 25 between Wheatland and Douglas. South Laramie Range and adjacent foothills including Interstate 80 between Laramie and Cheyenne. * WHEN...From late tonight through Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight or high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.
info.instruction: A High Wind Watch means there is the potential for a hazardous high wind event. Sustained winds of at least 40 mph, or gusts of 58 mph or stronger may occur. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts.

area.areaDesc: East Platte County; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills
